pkgmetadata.longdescription: Consistency, Homogeneity and Summary Statistics of Climatological Data // The package offers an S4 infrastructure to store climatological station data of various temporal aggregation scales. In-built quality control and homogeneity tests follow the methodology from the European Climate Assessment Dataset project. Wrappers for climate indices defined by the Expert Team on Climate Change Detection and Indices (ETCCDI), a quick summary of important climate statistics and climate diagram plots provide a fast overview of climatological characteristics of the station.
